verse_part: of those who have been fined
Yet it was I who destroyed
upon you When they will take
her, And you will be cast
from you While there were still
And you were like a firebrand
up for you as a dirge
from them, Though you have built
be to you? It will be darkness
them; And I will not even look
Therefore, I will make you go
And to those who feel secure
with you? And that one will say
Have we not by our own strength
That I will make the sun
it like a time of mourning
of it will be like a bitter
They will not have a fugitive
Are you not as the sons
in them; They will also plant
